title: A question...
body: What the hell is on Joey's head? Seriously.
author: Dan

comments.author: erin
comments.body: an aardvark?

comments.author: Scott
comments.body: your hat?

comments.author: nicki
comments.body:
a lampshade.

he had a bit too much eggnog.

comments.author: Rokonin
comments.body: God I hate that song.

comments.author: kate
comments.body: somewhere i have a picture of a guy named joey with a bandanna tied as a kerchief on his head.  i thought maybe that was it, . . . .

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: I'm still trying to figure out what impaired my tribal lunar speak from five years ago.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Make it stop... please, make it stop

comments.author: GO Magazine
comments.body: I think the question you're really asking is this: What the hell ISN'T on Joey's head?

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Come to think of it, I still don't know what is this "milkshake" that is bringing all the boys to yard.

comments.author: Yoda
comments.body: Bananas, this shit is.  S, B, A, N, A, N, A.

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Er, I don't understand. Who is Joey? And what is on his head?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: That's what we're all trying to figure out, Fyse. Other than dechipering exactly what is on Joey's head, it's also a lyric in a really, really bad song that the government has mandated be played every 3 minutes on every radio channel in the US.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Look at this photograph! Everytime I do it makes me laugh...

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: It's a piece of duck tape. Silver side up.

comments.author: Tyler
comments.body:
"tribal lunar speak"

I don't know if I should be thrilled or depressed that I got that joke.

comments.author: Matthew Martin (aka R.J. Jack MacReady Burton)
comments.body: I get it. 99% of today's songs suck anyway (except Weird Al, The Beastie Boys, and some other stuff).

comments.author: Just FYI
comments.body: If I were them I wouldn't let me in.

comments.author: melissa
comments.body:
Did you help plan this?
http://www.news-leader.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20051224/BREAKING01/51224001

comments.author: Scott
comments.body: Joey is a dumbass

comments.author: Karie
comments.body: HELP! I just went to their concert last night and they had pics playing on the bigscreen, and it showed "Joey" with whatever on his head and i missed it...what the hell IS ON JOEYS HEAD>???? :( its bugging me

comments.author: Train
comments.body: It's a Bolivian hairpiece.

comments.author: Sid
comments.body: The only thing that comes to my mind is an episode of "Friends" in which Joey gets a turkey stuck on his head.  Now that was funny.  Probably not what they mean, but it makes me chuckle.

comments.author: Liz
comments.body: it is a fancy icebucket.
